Question: This person claimed J Howard orally promised her half of his estate if she married him.
Hints: A petition to probate this person's will was filed in Los Angeles County Superior Court.
Both To the Limit and Skyscraper, and this person's performances in them, were critically panned.
After the coroner labeled the death "reserved," this person hired forensic pathologist Cyril Wecht to perform a second autopsy.
